name: Starfall 2D
description:
The stars have fallen from the sky, and it's your job to retrieve them! Collect at least 5 stars, then exit through the stargate star door.

This project was completed for Devtober 2020. My main goal was to get more experience using Unreal by making a simple 2D platformer.

*NOTE* - A controller is required! Functionality using other input methods has not been tested and cannot be guaranteed.

Hope you all enjoy!
